name: Material Design Foundation
description:
Ready to use set of Material Foundations Figma styles with icons, created to save your time.


The file consists of:

  • All defined typography styles with additional font weight variants.
  • Complete color palette organized in folders with the proper naming convention
  • All 24 elevations styles
  • 4px and 8pt baseline grids
  • Fluid and fixed layout grids
  • MUI icons in a single component with name and appearance variants.


About set

I created this set to save your time. I designed many User Interfaces based on the Material Design because of using the Material UI frontend implementation. I know that recreating a whole Material Design set of styles is time-consuming work. That's why I thought I would create this set to speed up your work and allow you to jump into the design process.


I will be happy to hear your feedback and suggestions on making this set better and more valuable. If you like my work, please share it, leave a comment, leave a like.


About the Author

My name is Patryk, and I’m a Product Designer with over 10 years of hands-on experience. I am focused on bringing you the best viable solutions for the product and creating tools that make people’s lives easier.


Styles are based on:

  • Typography - https://material.io/design/typography/the-type-system.html#type-scale
  • Color Palette - https://material.io/design/color/the-color-system.html#tools-for-picking-colors
  • Elevations - https://material.io/design/environment/elevation.html#default-elevations and https://material.angular.io/guide/elevation
  • Baseline grid - https://material.io/design/layout/spacing-methods.html#baseline-grid
  • Layout grid - https://material.io/design/layout/responsive-layout-grid.html#breakpoints


Icons are based on:

  • Version - 4.0.0
  • Source - https://github.com/google/material-design-icons
